content.text: 0) In a 1 quart or 1 liter jar, layer the ingredients in the order listed.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "layer"@32:37 / AC
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a 1 quart or 1 liter jar"@6:30 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( "the ingredients"@38:53 / FOOD
			:ref ( ing-0 )
			:ref ( ing-1 )
			:ref ( ing-2 )
			:ref ( ing-3 )
			:ref ( ing-4 )
		)
	)
)

content.text: 1) Attach a tag with the following instructions: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
